assignments.task: Confirm the time and location for moving the paintings
assignments.details: Contact the person who requested help to confirm the exact time and location for moving the paintings.
Prepare materials such as moving blankets, packing tape, and boxes to ensure the paintings are moved safely.
Inspect each painting to determine the best way to pack and move them without causing damage.
Carefully wrap each painting in moving blankets or bubble wrap and secure them in boxes or on a moving dolly.
Load the paintings into the vehicle and transport them to the designated location.
Unwrap the paintings and place them in the desired location, ensuring they are secure and properly displayed.
